description.p: You magically beguile a number of natural animals whose combined LV equals your level.
Two LV 0 animals count as 1 LV.
They regard you as their master, but if they cannot understand you, they will take the most obvious, instinctual action to assist you.
The spell ends if you or your allies cause harm to any of them.
The animals return to their wild form when the spell ends.
